
module: ietf-ospf
  augment /rt:routing/rt:routing-instance/rt:routing-protocols/rt:routing-protocol:
    +--rw ospf
       +--rw all-instances-inherit {instance-inheritance}?
       |  +--rw area
       |  +--rw interface
       +--rw operation-mode?          identityref
       +--rw instance* [af]
          +--rw af                   identityref
          +--rw router-id?           yang:dotted-quad {router-id}?
          +--rw admin-distance
          |  +--rw (granularity)?
          |  |  +--:(detail)
          |  |  |  +--rw intra-area?   uint8
          |  |  |  +--rw inter-area?   uint8
          |  |  +--:(coarse)
          |  |     +--rw internal?     uint8
          |  +--rw external?           uint8
          +--rw nsr {nsr}?
          |  +--rw enable?   boolean
          +--rw graceful-restart {graceful-restart}?
          |  +--rw enable?                       boolean
          |  +--rw helper-enable?                boolean
          |  +--rw restart-interval?             uint16
          |  +--rw helper-strict-lsa-checking?   boolean
          +--rw enable?              boolean {admin-control}?
          +--rw auto-cost {auto-cost}?
          |  +--rw enable?                boolean
          |  +--rw reference-bandwidth?   uint32
          +--rw spf-control
          |  +--rw paths?   uint16 {max-ecmp}?
          +--rw database-control
          |  +--rw max-lsa?   uint32 {max-lsa}?
          +--rw reload-control
          +--rw mpls
          |  +--rw te-rid {te-rid}?
          |  |  +--rw (source)?
          |  |     +--:(interface)
          |  |     |  +--rw interface?   if:interface-ref
          |  |     +--:(explicit)
          |  |        +--rw router-id?   inet:ipv4-address
          |  +--rw ldp
          |     +--rw igp-sync?     boolean {ldp-igp-sync}?
          |     +--rw autoconfig?   boolean {ldp-igp-autoconfig}?
          +--rw fast-reroute {fast-reroute}?
          |  +--rw lfa {lfa}?
          +--rw all-areas-inherit {area-inheritance}?
          |  +--rw area
          |  +--rw interface
          +--rw area* [area-id]
          |  +--rw area-id                   area-id-type
          |  +--rw area-type?                identityref
          |  +--rw summary?                  boolean
          |  +--rw default-cost?             uint32
          |  +--rw range* [prefix]
          |  |  +--rw prefix       string
          |  |  +--rw advertise?   boolean
          |  |  +--rw cost?        uint24
          |  +--rw all-interfaces-inherit {interface-inheritance}?
          |  |  +--rw interface
          |  +--rw virtual-link* [router-id]
          |  |  +--rw router-id              yang:dotted-quad
          |  |  +--rw cost?                  uint16
          |  |  +--rw hello-interval?        uint16
          |  |  +--rw dead-interval?         uint16
          |  |  +--rw retransmit-interval?   uint16
          |  |  +--rw transmit-delay?        uint16
          |  |  +--rw mtu-ignore?            boolean {mtu-ignore}?
          |  |  +--rw lls?                   boolean {lls}?
          |  |  +--rw prefix-suppression?    boolean {prefix-suppression}?
          |  |  +--rw bfd?                   boolean {bfd}?
          |  |  +--rw ttl-security {ttl-security}?
          |  |  |  +--rw enable?   boolean
          |  |  |  +--rw hops?     uint8
          |  |  +--rw enable?                boolean {admin-control}?
          |  |  +--rw authentication
          |  |     +--rw (auth-type-selection)?
          |  |        +--:(auth-ipsec) {ospfv3-authentication-ipsec}?
          |  |        |  +--rw sa?                 string
          |  |        +--:(auth-trailer-key-chain)
          |  |        |  +--rw key-chain?          key-chain:key-chain-ref
          |  |        +--:(auth-trailer-key)
          |  |           +--rw key?                string
          |  |           +--rw crypto-algorithm
          |  |              +--rw (algorithm)?
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha1-12)
          |  |                 |  +--rw hmac-sha1-12?   empty
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha1-20)
          |  |                 |  +--rw hmac-sha1-20?   empty
          |  |                 +--:(md5)
          |  |                 |  +--rw md5?            empty
          |  |                 +--:(sha-1)
          |  |                 |  +--rw sha-1?          empty
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha-1)
          |  |                 |  +--rw hmac-sha-1?     empty
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha-256)
          |  |                 |  +--rw hmac-sha-256?   empty
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha-384)
          |  |                 |  +--rw hmac-sha-384?   empty
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha-512)
          |  |                    +--rw hmac-sha-512?   empty
          |  +--rw sham-link* [local-id remote-id]
          |  |  +--rw local-id               inet:ip-address
          |  |  +--rw remote-id              inet:ip-address
          |  |  +--rw cost?                  uint16
          |  |  +--rw hello-interval?        uint16
          |  |  +--rw dead-interval?         uint16
          |  |  +--rw retransmit-interval?   uint16
          |  |  +--rw transmit-delay?        uint16
          |  |  +--rw mtu-ignore?            boolean {mtu-ignore}?
          |  |  +--rw lls?                   boolean {lls}?
          |  |  +--rw prefix-suppression?    boolean {prefix-suppression}?
          |  |  +--rw bfd?                   boolean {bfd}?
          |  |  +--rw ttl-security {ttl-security}?
          |  |  |  +--rw enable?   boolean
          |  |  |  +--rw hops?     uint8
          |  |  +--rw enable?                boolean {admin-control}?
          |  |  +--rw authentication
          |  |     +--rw (auth-type-selection)?
          |  |        +--:(auth-ipsec) {ospfv3-authentication-ipsec}?
          |  |        |  +--rw sa?                 string
          |  |        +--:(auth-trailer-key-chain)
          |  |        |  +--rw key-chain?          key-chain:key-chain-ref
          |  |        +--:(auth-trailer-key)
          |  |           +--rw key?                string
          |  |           +--rw crypto-algorithm
          |  |              +--rw (algorithm)?
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha1-12)
          |  |                 |  +--rw hmac-sha1-12?   empty
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha1-20)
          |  |                 |  +--rw hmac-sha1-20?   empty
          |  |                 +--:(md5)
          |  |                 |  +--rw md5?            empty
          |  |                 +--:(sha-1)
          |  |                 |  +--rw sha-1?          empty
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha-1)
          |  |                 |  +--rw hmac-sha-1?     empty
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha-256)
          |  |                 |  +--rw hmac-sha-256?   empty
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha-384)
          |  |                 |  +--rw hmac-sha-384?   empty
          |  |                 +--:(hmac-sha-512)
          |  |                    +--rw hmac-sha-512?   empty
          |  +--rw interface* [interface]
          |     +--rw interface              if:interface-ref
          |     +--rw network-type?          enumeration
          |     +--rw passive?               boolean
          |     +--rw demand-circuit?        boolean {demand-circuit}?
          |     +--rw multi-area {multi-area-adj}?
          |     |  +--rw multi-area-id?   area-id-type
          |     |  +--rw cost?            uint16
          |     +--rw static-neighbors
          |     |  +--rw neighbor* [address]
          |     |     +--rw address          inet:ip-address
          |     |     +--rw cost?            uint16
          |     |     +--rw poll-interval?   uint16
          |     |     +--rw priority?        uint8
          |     +--rw node-flag?             boolean {node-flag}?
          |     +--rw fast-reroute {fast-reroute}?
          |     |  +--rw lfa {lfa}?
          |     |     +--rw candidate-disabled?   boolean
          |     |     +--rw enabled?              boolean
          |     |     +--rw remote-lfa {remote-lfa}?
          |     |        +--rw enabled?   boolean
          |     +--rw cost?                  uint16
          |     +--rw hello-interval?        uint16
          |     +--rw dead-interval?         uint16
          |     +--rw retransmit-interval?   uint16
          |     +--rw transmit-delay?        uint16
          |     +--rw mtu-ignore?            boolean {mtu-ignore}?
          |     +--rw lls?                   boolean {lls}?
          |     +--rw prefix-suppression?    boolean {prefix-suppression}?
          |     +--rw bfd?                   boolean {bfd}?
          |     +--rw ttl-security {ttl-security}?
          |     |  +--rw enable?   boolean
          |     |  +--rw hops?     uint8
          |     +--rw enable?                boolean {admin-control}?
          |     +--rw authentication
          |     |  +--rw (auth-type-selection)?
          |     |     +--:(auth-ipsec) {ospfv3-authentication-ipsec}?
          |     |     |  +--rw sa?                 string
          |     |     +--:(auth-trailer-key-chain)
          |     |     |  +--rw key-chain?          key-chain:key-chain-ref
          |     |     +--:(auth-trailer-key)
          |     |        +--rw key?                string
          |     |        +--rw crypto-algorithm
          |     |           +--rw (algorithm)?
          |     |              +--:(hmac-sha1-12)
          |     |              |  +--rw hmac-sha1-12?   empty
          |     |              +--:(hmac-sha1-20)
          |     |              |  +--rw hmac-sha1-20?   empty
          |     |              +--:(md5)
          |     |              |  +--rw md5?            empty
          |     |              +--:(sha-1)
          |     |              |  +--rw sha-1?          empty
          |     |              +--:(hmac-sha-1)
          |     |              |  +--rw hmac-sha-1?     empty
          |     |              +--:(hmac-sha-256)
          |     |              |  +--rw hmac-sha-256?   empty
          |     |              +--:(hmac-sha-384)
          |     |              |  +--rw hmac-sha-384?   empty
          |     |              +--:(hmac-sha-512)
          |     |                 +--rw hmac-sha-512?   empty
          |     +--rw topology* [name] {ospf:multi-topology}?
          |        +--rw name    rib-ref
          |        +--rw cost?   uint32
          +--rw topology* [name] {multi-topology}?
             +--rw name    rib-ref
             +--rw area* [area-id]
                +--rw area-id         area-id-type
                +--rw area-type?      identityref
                +--rw summary?        boolean
                +--rw default-cost?   uint32
                +--rw range* [prefix]
                   +--rw prefix       string
                   +--rw advertise?   boolean
                   +--rw cost?        uint24
  augment /rt:routing-state/rt:routing-instance/rt:routing-protocols/rt:routing-protocol:
    +--ro ospf
       +--ro operation-mode?   identityref
       +--ro instance* [af]
          +--ro af               identityref
          +--ro router-id?       yang:dotted-quad
          +--ro area* [area-id]
          |  +--ro area-id            area-id-type
          |  +--ro interfaces* [interface]
          |  |  +--ro interface              string
          |  |  +--ro network-type?          enumeration
          |  |  +--ro passive?               boolean
          |  |  +--ro demand-circuit?        boolean {demand-circuit}?
          |  |  +--ro multi-area {multi-area-adj}?
          |  |  |  +--ro multi-area-id?   area-id-type
          |  |  |  +--ro cost?            uint16
          |  |  +--ro static-neighbors
          |  |  |  +--ro neighbor* [address]
          |  |  |     +--ro address          inet:ip-address
          |  |  |     +--ro cost?            uint16
          |  |  |     +--ro poll-interval?   uint16
          |  |  |     +--ro priority?        uint8
          |  |  +--ro node-flag?             boolean {node-flag}?
          |  |  +--ro fast-reroute {fast-reroute}?
          |  |  |  +--ro lfa {lfa}?
          |  |  |     +--ro candidate-disabled?   boolean
          |  |  |     +--ro enabled?              boolean
          |  |  |     +--ro remote-lfa {remote-lfa}?
          |  |  |        +--ro enabled?   boolean
          |  |  +--ro cost?                  uint16
          |  |  +--ro hello-interval?        uint16
          |  |  +--ro dead-interval?         uint16
          |  |  +--ro retransmit-interval?   uint16
          |  |  +--ro transmit-delay?        uint16
          |  |  +--ro mtu-ignore?            boolean {mtu-ignore}?
          |  |  +--ro lls?                   boolean {lls}?
          |  |  +--ro prefix-suppression?    boolean {prefix-suppression}?
          |  |  +--ro bfd?                   boolean {bfd}?
          |  |  +--ro ttl-security {ttl-security}?
          |  |  |  +--ro enable?   boolean
          |  |  |  +--ro hops?     uint8
          |  |  +--ro enable?                boolean {admin-control}?
          |  |  +--ro authentication
          |  |  |  +--ro (auth-type-selection)?
          |  |  |     +--:(auth-ipsec) {ospfv3-authentication-ipsec}?
          |  |  |     |  +--ro sa?                 string
          |  |  |     +--:(auth-trailer-key-chain)
          |  |  |     |  +--ro key-chain?          key-chain:key-chain-ref
          |  |  |     +--:(auth-trailer-key)
          |  |  |        +--ro key?                string
          |  |  |        +--ro crypto-algorithm
          |  |  |           +--ro (algorithm)?
          |  |  |              +--:(hmac-sha1-12)
          |  |  |              |  +--ro hmac-sha1-12?   empty
          |  |  |              +--:(hmac-sha1-20)
          |  |  |              |  +--ro hmac-sha1-20?   empty
          |  |  |              +--:(md5)
          |  |  |              |  +--ro md5?            empty
          |  |  |              +--:(sha-1)
          |  |  |              |  +--ro sha-1?          empty
          |  |  |              +--:(hmac-sha-1)
          |  |  |              |  +--ro hmac-sha-1?     empty
          |  |  |              +--:(hmac-sha-256)
          |  |  |              |  +--ro hmac-sha-256?   empty
          |  |  |              +--:(hmac-sha-384)
          |  |  |              |  +--ro hmac-sha-384?   empty
          |  |  |              +--:(hmac-sha-512)
          |  |  |                 +--ro hmac-sha-512?   empty
          |  |  +--ro state?                 string
          |  |  +--ro hello-timer?           uint32
          |  |  +--ro wait-timer?            uint32
          |  |  +--ro dr?                    inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  +--ro bdr?                   inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  +--ro neighbor* [neighbor-id]
          |  |  |  +--ro neighbor-id    inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |  +--ro address?       inet:ip-address
          |  |  |  +--ro dr?            inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |  +--ro bdr?           inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |  +--ro state?         nbr-state-type
          |  |  +--ro link-scope-lsas* [lsa-type]
          |  |  |  +--ro lsa-type          uint8
          |  |  |  +--ro link-scope-lsa* [lsa-id adv-router]
          |  |  |     +--ro lsa-id               union
          |  |  |     +--ro adv-router           inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |     +--ro decoded-completed?   boolean
          |  |  |     +--ro raw-data?            yang:hex-string
          |  |  |     +--ro (version)?
          |  |  |        +--:(v2)
          |  |  |        |  +--ro ospfv2
          |  |  |        |     +--ro header
          |  |  |        |     |  +--ro options        bits
          |  |  |        |     |  +--ro lsa-id         inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |        |     |  +--ro opaque-type    uint8
          |  |  |        |     |  +--ro opaque-id      uint24
          |  |  |        |     |  +--ro age            uint16
          |  |  |        |     |  +--ro type           uint16
          |  |  |        |     |  +--ro adv-router     yang:dotted-quad
          |  |  |        |     |  +--ro seq-num        string
          |  |  |        |     |  +--ro checksum       string
          |  |  |        |     |  +--ro length         uint16
          |  |  |        |     +--ro body
          |  |  |        |        +--ro router
          |  |  |        |        |  +--ro flags?          bits
          |  |  |        |        |  +--ro num-of-links?   uint16
          |  |  |        |        |  +--ro link* [link-id link-data]
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro link-id      union
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro link-data    union
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro type?        uint8
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro topology* [mt-id]
          |  |  |        |        |        +--ro mt-id     uint8
          |  |  |        |        |        +--ro metric?   uint16
          |  |  |        |        +--ro network
          |  |  |        |        |  +--ro network-mask?      inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |        |        |  +--ro attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
          |  |  |        |        +--ro summary
          |  |  |        |        |  +--ro network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |        |        |  +--ro topology* [mt-id]
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro mt-id     uint8
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro metric?   uint24
          |  |  |        |        +--ro external
          |  |  |        |        |  +--ro network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |        |        |  +--ro topology* [mt-id]
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro mt-id                 uint8
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro flags?                bits
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro metric?               uint24
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro forwarding-address?   inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |        |        |     +--ro external-route-tag?   uint32
          |  |  |        |        +--ro opaque
          |  |  |        |           +--ro unknown-tlv* [type]
          |  |  |        |           |  +--ro type      uint16
          |  |  |        |           |  +--ro length?   uint16
          |  |  |        |           |  +--ro value?    yang:hex-string
          |  |  |        |           +--ro router-address-tlv
          |  |  |        |           |  +--ro router-address?   inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |        |           +--ro link-tlv
          |  |  |        |              +--ro link-type                   uint8
          |  |  |        |              +--ro link-id                     union
          |  |  |        |              +--ro local-if-ipv4-addr*         inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |        |              +--ro local-remote-ipv4-addr*     inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |        |              +--ro te-metric?                  uint32
          |  |  |        |              +--ro max-bandwidth?              decimal64
          |  |  |        |              +--ro max-reservable-bandwidth?   decimal64
          |  |  |        |              +--ro unreserved-bandwidth?       decimal64
          |  |  |        |              +--ro admin-group?                uint32
          |  |  |        |              +--ro unknown-subtlv* [type]
          |  |  |        |                 +--ro type      uint16
          |  |  |        |                 +--ro length?   uint16
          |  |  |        |                 +--ro value?    yang:hex-string
          |  |  |        +--:(v3)
          |  |  |           +--ro ospfv3
          |  |  |              +--ro header
          |  |  |              |  +--ro lsa-id        uint32
          |  |  |              |  +--ro age           uint16
          |  |  |              |  +--ro type          uint16
          |  |  |              |  +--ro adv-router    yang:dotted-quad
          |  |  |              |  +--ro seq-num       string
          |  |  |              |  +--ro checksum      string
          |  |  |              |  +--ro length        uint16
          |  |  |              |  +--ro options       bits
          |  |  |              +--ro body
          |  |  |                 +--ro router
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro flags      bits
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro options    bits
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro link* [interface-id neighbor-interface-id neighbor-router-id]
          |  |  |                 |     +--ro interface-id             uint32
          |  |  |                 |     +--ro neighbor-interface-id    uint32
          |  |  |                 |     +--ro neighbor-router-id       yang:dotted-quad
          |  |  |                 |     +--ro type?                    uint8
          |  |  |                 |     +--ro metric?                  uint16
          |  |  |                 +--ro network
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro options            bits
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
          |  |  |                 +--ro inter-area-prefix
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro metric?           uint24
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro prefix?           string
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro prefix-options    string
          |  |  |                 +--ro inter-area-router
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro options                  bits
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro metric?                  uint24
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro destination-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
          |  |  |                 +--ro as-external
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro metric?                     uint24
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro flags?                      bits
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro referenced-ls-type?         uint16
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro prefix?                     string
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro prefix-options              string
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro external-route-tag?         uint32
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
          |  |  |                 +--ro nssa
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro metric?                     uint24
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro flags?                      bits
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro referenced-ls-type?         uint16
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro prefix?                     string
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro prefix-options              string
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro external-route-tag?         uint32
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
          |  |  |                 +--ro link
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro rtr-priority?                   uint8
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro options                         bits
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro link-local-interface-address?   inet:ip-address
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro num-of-prefixes?                uint32
          |  |  |                 |  +--ro prefix-list* [prefix]
          |  |  |                 |     +--ro prefix            string
          |  |  |                 |     +--ro prefix-options    string
          |  |  |                 +--ro intra-area-prefix
          |  |  |                    +--ro referenced-ls-type?         uint16
          |  |  |                    +--ro referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
          |  |  |                    +--ro referenced-adv-router?      inet:ipv4-address
          |  |  |                    +--ro num-of-prefixes?            uint16
          |  |  |                    +--ro prefix-list* [prefix]
          |  |  |                       +--ro prefix            string
          |  |  |                       +--ro prefix-options    string
          |  |  |                       +--ro metric?           uint24
          |  |  +--ro topology* [name] {ospf:multi-topology}?
          |  |     +--ro name    rib-ref
          |  +--ro area-scope-lsas* [lsa-type]
          |     +--ro lsa-type          uint8
          |     +--ro area-scope-lsa* [lsa-id adv-router]
          |        +--ro lsa-id               union
          |        +--ro adv-router           inet:ipv4-address
          |        +--ro decoded-completed?   boolean
          |        +--ro raw-data?            yang:hex-string
          |        +--ro (version)?
          |           +--:(v2)
          |           |  +--ro ospfv2
          |           |     +--ro header
          |           |     |  +--ro options        bits
          |           |     |  +--ro lsa-id         inet:ipv4-address
          |           |     |  +--ro opaque-type    uint8
          |           |     |  +--ro opaque-id      uint24
          |           |     |  +--ro age            uint16
          |           |     |  +--ro type           uint16
          |           |     |  +--ro adv-router     yang:dotted-quad
          |           |     |  +--ro seq-num        string
          |           |     |  +--ro checksum       string
          |           |     |  +--ro length         uint16
          |           |     +--ro body
          |           |        +--ro router
          |           |        |  +--ro flags?          bits
          |           |        |  +--ro num-of-links?   uint16
          |           |        |  +--ro link* [link-id link-data]
          |           |        |     +--ro link-id      union
          |           |        |     +--ro link-data    union
          |           |        |     +--ro type?        uint8
          |           |        |     +--ro topology* [mt-id]
          |           |        |        +--ro mt-id     uint8
          |           |        |        +--ro metric?   uint16
          |           |        +--ro network
          |           |        |  +--ro network-mask?      inet:ipv4-address
          |           |        |  +--ro attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
          |           |        +--ro summary
          |           |        |  +--ro network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
          |           |        |  +--ro topology* [mt-id]
          |           |        |     +--ro mt-id     uint8
          |           |        |     +--ro metric?   uint24
          |           |        +--ro external
          |           |        |  +--ro network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
          |           |        |  +--ro topology* [mt-id]
          |           |        |     +--ro mt-id                 uint8
          |           |        |     +--ro flags?                bits
          |           |        |     +--ro metric?               uint24
          |           |        |     +--ro forwarding-address?   inet:ipv4-address
          |           |        |     +--ro external-route-tag?   uint32
          |           |        +--ro opaque
          |           |           +--ro unknown-tlv* [type]
          |           |           |  +--ro type      uint16
          |           |           |  +--ro length?   uint16
          |           |           |  +--ro value?    yang:hex-string
          |           |           +--ro router-address-tlv
          |           |           |  +--ro router-address?   inet:ipv4-address
          |           |           +--ro link-tlv
          |           |              +--ro link-type                   uint8
          |           |              +--ro link-id                     union
          |           |              +--ro local-if-ipv4-addr*         inet:ipv4-address
          |           |              +--ro local-remote-ipv4-addr*     inet:ipv4-address
          |           |              +--ro te-metric?                  uint32
          |           |              +--ro max-bandwidth?              decimal64
          |           |              +--ro max-reservable-bandwidth?   decimal64
          |           |              +--ro unreserved-bandwidth?       decimal64
          |           |              +--ro admin-group?                uint32
          |           |              +--ro unknown-subtlv* [type]
          |           |                 +--ro type      uint16
          |           |                 +--ro length?   uint16
          |           |                 +--ro value?    yang:hex-string
          |           +--:(v3)
          |              +--ro ospfv3
          |                 +--ro header
          |                 |  +--ro lsa-id        uint32
          |                 |  +--ro age           uint16
          |                 |  +--ro type          uint16
          |                 |  +--ro adv-router    yang:dotted-quad
          |                 |  +--ro seq-num       string
          |                 |  +--ro checksum      string
          |                 |  +--ro length        uint16
          |                 |  +--ro options       bits
          |                 +--ro body
          |                    +--ro router
          |                    |  +--ro flags      bits
          |                    |  +--ro options    bits
          |                    |  +--ro link* [interface-id neighbor-interface-id neighbor-router-id]
          |                    |     +--ro interface-id             uint32
          |                    |     +--ro neighbor-interface-id    uint32
          |                    |     +--ro neighbor-router-id       yang:dotted-quad
          |                    |     +--ro type?                    uint8
          |                    |     +--ro metric?                  uint16
          |                    +--ro network
          |                    |  +--ro options            bits
          |                    |  +--ro attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
          |                    +--ro inter-area-prefix
          |                    |  +--ro metric?           uint24
          |                    |  +--ro prefix?           string
          |                    |  +--ro prefix-options    string
          |                    +--ro inter-area-router
          |                    |  +--ro options                  bits
          |                    |  +--ro metric?                  uint24
          |                    |  +--ro destination-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
          |                    +--ro as-external
          |                    |  +--ro metric?                     uint24
          |                    |  +--ro flags?                      bits
          |                    |  +--ro referenced-ls-type?         uint16
          |                    |  +--ro prefix?                     string
          |                    |  +--ro prefix-options              string
          |                    |  +--ro forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
          |                    |  +--ro external-route-tag?         uint32
          |                    |  +--ro referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
          |                    +--ro nssa
          |                    |  +--ro metric?                     uint24
          |                    |  +--ro flags?                      bits
          |                    |  +--ro referenced-ls-type?         uint16
          |                    |  +--ro prefix?                     string
          |                    |  +--ro prefix-options              string
          |                    |  +--ro forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
          |                    |  +--ro external-route-tag?         uint32
          |                    |  +--ro referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
          |                    +--ro link
          |                    |  +--ro rtr-priority?                   uint8
          |                    |  +--ro options                         bits
          |                    |  +--ro link-local-interface-address?   inet:ip-address
          |                    |  +--ro num-of-prefixes?                uint32
          |                    |  +--ro prefix-list* [prefix]
          |                    |     +--ro prefix            string
          |                    |     +--ro prefix-options    string
          |                    +--ro intra-area-prefix
          |                       +--ro referenced-ls-type?         uint16
          |                       +--ro referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
          |                       +--ro referenced-adv-router?      inet:ipv4-address
          |                       +--ro num-of-prefixes?            uint16
          |                       +--ro prefix-list* [prefix]
          |                          +--ro prefix            string
          |                          +--ro prefix-options    string
          |                          +--ro metric?           uint24
          +--ro as-scope-lsas* [lsa-type]
          |  +--ro lsa-type        uint8
          |  +--ro as-scope-lsa* [lsa-id adv-router]
          |     +--ro lsa-id               union
          |     +--ro adv-router           inet:ipv4-address
          |     +--ro decoded-completed?   boolean
          |     +--ro raw-data?            yang:hex-string
          |     +--ro (version)?
          |        +--:(v2)
          |        |  +--ro ospfv2
          |        |     +--ro header
          |        |     |  +--ro options        bits
          |        |     |  +--ro lsa-id         inet:ipv4-address
          |        |     |  +--ro opaque-type    uint8
          |        |     |  +--ro opaque-id      uint24
          |        |     |  +--ro age            uint16
          |        |     |  +--ro type           uint16
          |        |     |  +--ro adv-router     yang:dotted-quad
          |        |     |  +--ro seq-num        string
          |        |     |  +--ro checksum       string
          |        |     |  +--ro length         uint16
          |        |     +--ro body
          |        |        +--ro router
          |        |        |  +--ro flags?          bits
          |        |        |  +--ro num-of-links?   uint16
          |        |        |  +--ro link* [link-id link-data]
          |        |        |     +--ro link-id      union
          |        |        |     +--ro link-data    union
          |        |        |     +--ro type?        uint8
          |        |        |     +--ro topology* [mt-id]
          |        |        |        +--ro mt-id     uint8
          |        |        |        +--ro metric?   uint16
          |        |        +--ro network
          |        |        |  +--ro network-mask?      inet:ipv4-address
          |        |        |  +--ro attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
          |        |        +--ro summary
          |        |        |  +--ro network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
          |        |        |  +--ro topology* [mt-id]
          |        |        |     +--ro mt-id     uint8
          |        |        |     +--ro metric?   uint24
          |        |        +--ro external
          |        |        |  +--ro network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
          |        |        |  +--ro topology* [mt-id]
          |        |        |     +--ro mt-id                 uint8
          |        |        |     +--ro flags?                bits
          |        |        |     +--ro metric?               uint24
          |        |        |     +--ro forwarding-address?   inet:ipv4-address
          |        |        |     +--ro external-route-tag?   uint32
          |        |        +--ro opaque
          |        |           +--ro unknown-tlv* [type]
          |        |           |  +--ro type      uint16
          |        |           |  +--ro length?   uint16
          |        |           |  +--ro value?    yang:hex-string
          |        |           +--ro router-address-tlv
          |        |           |  +--ro router-address?   inet:ipv4-address
          |        |           +--ro link-tlv
          |        |              +--ro link-type                   uint8
          |        |              +--ro link-id                     union
          |        |              +--ro local-if-ipv4-addr*         inet:ipv4-address
          |        |              +--ro local-remote-ipv4-addr*     inet:ipv4-address
          |        |              +--ro te-metric?                  uint32
          |        |              +--ro max-bandwidth?              decimal64
          |        |              +--ro max-reservable-bandwidth?   decimal64
          |        |              +--ro unreserved-bandwidth?       decimal64
          |        |              +--ro admin-group?                uint32
          |        |              +--ro unknown-subtlv* [type]
          |        |                 +--ro type      uint16
          |        |                 +--ro length?   uint16
          |        |                 +--ro value?    yang:hex-string
          |        +--:(v3)
          |           +--ro ospfv3
          |              +--ro header
          |              |  +--ro lsa-id        uint32
          |              |  +--ro age           uint16
          |              |  +--ro type          uint16
          |              |  +--ro adv-router    yang:dotted-quad
          |              |  +--ro seq-num       string
          |              |  +--ro checksum      string
          |              |  +--ro length        uint16
          |              |  +--ro options       bits
          |              +--ro body
          |                 +--ro router
          |                 |  +--ro flags      bits
          |                 |  +--ro options    bits
          |                 |  +--ro link* [interface-id neighbor-interface-id neighbor-router-id]
          |                 |     +--ro interface-id             uint32
          |                 |     +--ro neighbor-interface-id    uint32
          |                 |     +--ro neighbor-router-id       yang:dotted-quad
          |                 |     +--ro type?                    uint8
          |                 |     +--ro metric?                  uint16
          |                 +--ro network
          |                 |  +--ro options            bits
          |                 |  +--ro attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
          |                 +--ro inter-area-prefix
          |                 |  +--ro metric?           uint24
          |                 |  +--ro prefix?           string
          |                 |  +--ro prefix-options    string
          |                 +--ro inter-area-router
          |                 |  +--ro options                  bits
          |                 |  +--ro metric?                  uint24
          |                 |  +--ro destination-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
          |                 +--ro as-external
          |                 |  +--ro metric?                     uint24
          |                 |  +--ro flags?                      bits
          |                 |  +--ro referenced-ls-type?         uint16
          |                 |  +--ro prefix?                     string
          |                 |  +--ro prefix-options              string
          |                 |  +--ro forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
          |                 |  +--ro external-route-tag?         uint32
          |                 |  +--ro referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
          |                 +--ro nssa
          |                 |  +--ro metric?                     uint24
          |                 |  +--ro flags?                      bits
          |                 |  +--ro referenced-ls-type?         uint16
          |                 |  +--ro prefix?                     string
          |                 |  +--ro prefix-options              string
          |                 |  +--ro forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
          |                 |  +--ro external-route-tag?         uint32
          |                 |  +--ro referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
          |                 +--ro link
          |                 |  +--ro rtr-priority?                   uint8
          |                 |  +--ro options                         bits
          |                 |  +--ro link-local-interface-address?   inet:ip-address
          |                 |  +--ro num-of-prefixes?                uint32
          |                 |  +--ro prefix-list* [prefix]
          |                 |     +--ro prefix            string
          |                 |     +--ro prefix-options    string
          |                 +--ro intra-area-prefix
          |                    +--ro referenced-ls-type?         uint16
          |                    +--ro referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
          |                    +--ro referenced-adv-router?      inet:ipv4-address
          |                    +--ro num-of-prefixes?            uint16
          |                    +--ro prefix-list* [prefix]
          |                       +--ro prefix            string
          |                       +--ro prefix-options    string
          |                       +--ro metric?           uint24
          +--ro topology* [name] {multi-topology}?
             +--ro name    rib-ref
             +--ro area* [area-id]
                +--ro area-id    area-id-type
  augment /rt:routing-state/rt:routing-instance/rt:ribs/rt:rib/rt:routes/rt:route:
    +--ro tag?          uint32
    +--ro route-type?   enumeration

  notifications:
    +---n if-state-change
    |  +--ro routing-instance?        rt:routing-instance-ref
    |  +--ro routing-protocol-name?   string
    |  +--ro instance-af
    |  |  +--ro af?   identityref
    |  +--ro link-type?               identityref
    |  +--ro interface
    |  |  +--ro interface?   if:interface-ref
    |  +--ro virtual-link
    |  |  +--ro area-id?              uint32
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
    |  +--ro sham-link
    |  |  +--ro area-id?          uint32
    |  |  +--ro local-ip-addr?    inet:ip-address
    |  |  +--ro remote-ip-addr?   inet:ip-address
    |  +--ro state?                   string
    +---n if-config-error
    |  +--ro routing-instance?        rt:routing-instance-ref
    |  +--ro routing-protocol-name?   string
    |  +--ro instance-af
    |  |  +--ro af?   identityref
    |  +--ro link-type?               identityref
    |  +--ro interface
    |  |  +--ro interface?       if:interface-ref
    |  |  +--ro packet-source?   yang:dotted-quad
    |  +--ro virtual-link
    |  |  +--ro area-id?              uint32
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
    |  +--ro sham-link
    |  |  +--ro area-id?          uint32
    |  |  +--ro local-ip-addr?    inet:ip-address
    |  |  +--ro remote-ip-addr?   inet:ip-address
    |  +--ro packet-type?             packet-type
    |  +--ro error?                   enumeration
    +---n nbr-state-change
    |  +--ro routing-instance?        rt:routing-instance-ref
    |  +--ro routing-protocol-name?   string
    |  +--ro instance-af
    |  |  +--ro af?   identityref
    |  +--ro link-type?               identityref
    |  +--ro interface
    |  |  +--ro interface?            if:interface-ref
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-ip-addr?     yang:dotted-quad
    |  +--ro virtual-link
    |  |  +--ro area-id?              uint32
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
    |  +--ro sham-link
    |  |  +--ro area-id?              uint32
    |  |  +--ro local-ip-addr?        inet:ip-address
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-ip-addr?     yang:dotted-quad
    |  +--ro state?                   nbr-state-type
    +---n nbr-restart-helper-status-change
    |  +--ro routing-instance?        rt:routing-instance-ref
    |  +--ro routing-protocol-name?   string
    |  +--ro instance-af
    |  |  +--ro af?   identityref
    |  +--ro link-type?               identityref
    |  +--ro interface
    |  |  +--ro interface?            if:interface-ref
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-ip-addr?     yang:dotted-quad
    |  +--ro virtual-link
    |  |  +--ro area-id?              uint32
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
    |  +--ro status?                  restart-helper-status-type
    |  +--ro age?                     uint32
    |  +--ro exit-reason?             restart-exit-reason-type
    +---n rx-bad-packet
    |  +--ro routing-instance?        rt:routing-instance-ref
    |  +--ro routing-protocol-name?   string
    |  +--ro instance-af
    |  |  +--ro af?   identityref
    |  +--ro link-type?               identityref
    |  +--ro interface
    |  |  +--ro interface?       if:interface-ref
    |  |  +--ro packet-source?   yang:dotted-quad
    |  +--ro virtual-link
    |  |  +--ro area-id?              uint32
    |  |  +--ro neighbor-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
    |  +--ro sham-link
    |  |  +--ro area-id?          uint32
    |  |  +--ro local-ip-addr?    inet:ip-address
    |  |  +--ro remote-ip-addr?   inet:ip-address
    |  +--ro packet-type?             packet-type
    +---n lsdb-approaching-overflow
    |  +--ro routing-instance?        rt:routing-instance-ref
    |  +--ro routing-protocol-name?   string
    |  +--ro instance-af
    |  |  +--ro af?   identityref
    |  +--ro ext-lsdb-limit?          uint32
    +---n lsdb-overflow
    |  +--ro routing-instance?        rt:routing-instance-ref
    |  +--ro routing-protocol-name?   string
    |  +--ro instance-af
    |  |  +--ro af?   identityref
    |  +--ro ext-lsdb-limit?          uint32
    +---n nssa-translator-status-change
    |  +--ro routing-instance?        rt:routing-instance-ref
    |  +--ro routing-protocol-name?   string
    |  +--ro instance-af
    |  |  +--ro af?   identityref
    |  +--ro area-id?                 uint32
    |  +--ro status?                  nssa-translator-state-type
    +---n restart-status-change
       +--ro routing-instance?        rt:routing-instance-ref
       +--ro routing-protocol-name?   string
       +--ro instance-af
       |  +--ro af?   identityref
       +--ro status?                  restart-status-type
       +--ro restart-interval?        uint16
       +--ro exit-reason?             restart-exit-reason-type

  grouping instance-fast-reroute-config
    +-- fast-reroute {fast-reroute}?
       +-- lfa {lfa}?
  grouping interface-fast-reroute-config
    +-- fast-reroute {fast-reroute}?
       +-- lfa {lfa}?
          +-- candidate-disabled?   boolean
          +-- enabled?              boolean
          +-- remote-lfa {remote-lfa}?
             +-- enabled?   boolean
  grouping interface-common-config
    +-- cost?                  uint16
    +-- hello-interval?        uint16
    +-- dead-interval?         uint16
    +-- retransmit-interval?   uint16
    +-- transmit-delay?        uint16
    +-- mtu-ignore?            boolean {mtu-ignore}?
    +-- lls?                   boolean {lls}?
    +-- prefix-suppression?    boolean {prefix-suppression}?
    +-- bfd?                   boolean {bfd}?
    +-- ttl-security {ttl-security}?
    |  +-- enable?   boolean
    |  +-- hops?     uint8
    +-- enable?                boolean {admin-control}?
    +-- authentication
       +-- (auth-type-selection)?
          +--:(auth-ipsec) {ospfv3-authentication-ipsec}?
          |  +-- sa?                 string
          +--:(auth-trailer-key-chain)
          |  +-- key-chain?          key-chain:key-chain-ref
          +--:(auth-trailer-key)
             +-- key?                string
             +-- crypto-algorithm
                +-- (algorithm)?
                   +--:(hmac-sha1-12)
                   |  +-- hmac-sha1-12?   empty
                   +--:(hmac-sha1-20)
                   |  +-- hmac-sha1-20?   empty
                   +--:(md5)
                   |  +-- md5?            empty
                   +--:(sha-1)
                   |  +-- sha-1?          empty
                   +--:(hmac-sha-1)
                   |  +-- hmac-sha-1?     empty
                   +--:(hmac-sha-256)
                   |  +-- hmac-sha-256?   empty
                   +--:(hmac-sha-384)
                   |  +-- hmac-sha-384?   empty
                   +--:(hmac-sha-512)
                      +-- hmac-sha-512?   empty
  grouping interface-config
    +-- network-type?          enumeration
    +-- passive?               boolean
    +-- demand-circuit?        boolean {demand-circuit}?
    +-- multi-area {multi-area-adj}?
    |  +-- multi-area-id?   area-id-type
    |  +-- cost?            uint16
    +-- static-neighbors
    |  +-- neighbor* [address]
    |     +-- address?         inet:ip-address
    |     +-- cost?            uint16
    |     +-- poll-interval?   uint16
    |     +-- priority?        uint8
    +-- node-flag?             boolean {node-flag}?
    +-- fast-reroute {fast-reroute}?
    |  +-- lfa {lfa}?
    |     +-- candidate-disabled?   boolean
    |     +-- enabled?              boolean
    |     +-- remote-lfa {remote-lfa}?
    |        +-- enabled?   boolean
    +-- cost?                  uint16
    +-- hello-interval?        uint16
    +-- dead-interval?         uint16
    +-- retransmit-interval?   uint16
    +-- transmit-delay?        uint16
    +-- mtu-ignore?            boolean {mtu-ignore}?
    +-- lls?                   boolean {lls}?
    +-- prefix-suppression?    boolean {prefix-suppression}?
    +-- bfd?                   boolean {bfd}?
    +-- ttl-security {ttl-security}?
    |  +-- enable?   boolean
    |  +-- hops?     uint8
    +-- enable?                boolean {admin-control}?
    +-- authentication
       +-- (auth-type-selection)?
          +--:(auth-ipsec) {ospfv3-authentication-ipsec}?
          |  +-- sa?                 string
          +--:(auth-trailer-key-chain)
          |  +-- key-chain?          key-chain:key-chain-ref
          +--:(auth-trailer-key)
             +-- key?                string
             +-- crypto-algorithm
                +-- (algorithm)?
                   +--:(hmac-sha1-12)
                   |  +-- hmac-sha1-12?   empty
                   +--:(hmac-sha1-20)
                   |  +-- hmac-sha1-20?   empty
                   +--:(md5)
                   |  +-- md5?            empty
                   +--:(sha-1)
                   |  +-- sha-1?          empty
                   +--:(hmac-sha-1)
                   |  +-- hmac-sha-1?     empty
                   +--:(hmac-sha-256)
                   |  +-- hmac-sha-256?   empty
                   +--:(hmac-sha-384)
                   |  +-- hmac-sha-384?   empty
                   +--:(hmac-sha-512)
                      +-- hmac-sha-512?   empty
  grouping tlv
    +-- type?     uint16
    +-- length?   uint16
    +-- value?    yang:hex-string
  grouping ospfv2-lsa-body
    +-- router
    |  +-- flags?          bits
    |  +-- num-of-links?   uint16
    |  +-- link* [link-id link-data]
    |     +-- link-id?     union
    |     +-- link-data?   union
    |     +-- type?        uint8
    |     +-- topology* [mt-id]
    |        +-- mt-id?    uint8
    |        +-- metric?   uint16
    +-- network
    |  +-- network-mask?      inet:ipv4-address
    |  +-- attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
    +-- summary
    |  +-- network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
    |  +-- topology* [mt-id]
    |     +-- mt-id?    uint8
    |     +-- metric?   uint24
    +-- external
    |  +-- network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
    |  +-- topology* [mt-id]
    |     +-- mt-id?                uint8
    |     +-- flags?                bits
    |     +-- metric?               uint24
    |     +-- forwarding-address?   inet:ipv4-address
    |     +-- external-route-tag?   uint32
    +-- opaque
       +-- unknown-tlv* [type]
       |  +-- type?     uint16
       |  +-- length?   uint16
       |  +-- value?    yang:hex-string
       +-- router-address-tlv
       |  +-- router-address?   inet:ipv4-address
       +-- link-tlv
          +-- link-type                   uint8
          +-- link-id                     union
          +-- local-if-ipv4-addr*         inet:ipv4-address
          +-- local-remote-ipv4-addr*     inet:ipv4-address
          +-- te-metric?                  uint32
          +-- max-bandwidth?              decimal64
          +-- max-reservable-bandwidth?   decimal64
          +-- unreserved-bandwidth?       decimal64
          +-- admin-group?                uint32
          +-- unknown-subtlv* [type]
             +-- type?     uint16
             +-- length?   uint16
             +-- value?    yang:hex-string
  grouping ospfv3-lsa-options
    +-- options    bits
  grouping ospfv3-lsa-prefix
    +-- prefix?           string
    +-- prefix-options    string
  grouping ospfv3-lsa-external
    +-- metric?                     uint24
    +-- flags?                      bits
    +-- referenced-ls-type?         uint16
    +-- prefix?                     string
    +-- prefix-options              string
    +-- forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
    +-- external-route-tag?         uint32
    +-- referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
  grouping ospfv3-lsa-body
    +-- router
    |  +-- flags      bits
    |  +-- options    bits
    |  +-- link* [interface-id neighbor-interface-id neighbor-router-id]
    |     +-- interface-id?            uint32
    |     +-- neighbor-interface-id?   uint32
    |     +-- neighbor-router-id?      yang:dotted-quad
    |     +-- type?                    uint8
    |     +-- metric?                  uint16
    +-- network
    |  +-- options            bits
    |  +-- attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
    +-- inter-area-prefix
    |  +-- metric?           uint24
    |  +-- prefix?           string
    |  +-- prefix-options    string
    +-- inter-area-router
    |  +-- options                  bits
    |  +-- metric?                  uint24
    |  +-- destination-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
    +-- as-external
    |  +-- metric?                     uint24
    |  +-- flags?                      bits
    |  +-- referenced-ls-type?         uint16
    |  +-- prefix?                     string
    |  +-- prefix-options              string
    |  +-- forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
    |  +-- external-route-tag?         uint32
    |  +-- referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
    +-- nssa
    |  +-- metric?                     uint24
    |  +-- flags?                      bits
    |  +-- referenced-ls-type?         uint16
    |  +-- prefix?                     string
    |  +-- prefix-options              string
    |  +-- forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
    |  +-- external-route-tag?         uint32
    |  +-- referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
    +-- link
    |  +-- rtr-priority?                   uint8
    |  +-- options                         bits
    |  +-- link-local-interface-address?   inet:ip-address
    |  +-- num-of-prefixes?                uint32
    |  +-- prefix-list* [prefix]
    |     +-- prefix?           string
    |     +-- prefix-options    string
    +-- intra-area-prefix
       +-- referenced-ls-type?         uint16
       +-- referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
       +-- referenced-adv-router?      inet:ipv4-address
       +-- num-of-prefixes?            uint16
       +-- prefix-list* [prefix]
          +-- prefix?           string
          +-- prefix-options    string
          +-- metric?           uint24
  grouping lsa-header
    +-- age           uint16
    +-- type          uint16
    +-- adv-router    yang:dotted-quad
    +-- seq-num       string
    +-- checksum      string
    +-- length        uint16
  grouping ospfv2-lsa
    +-- header
    |  +-- options        bits
    |  +-- lsa-id         inet:ipv4-address
    |  +-- opaque-type    uint8
    |  +-- opaque-id      uint24
    |  +-- age            uint16
    |  +-- type           uint16
    |  +-- adv-router     yang:dotted-quad
    |  +-- seq-num        string
    |  +-- checksum       string
    |  +-- length         uint16
    +-- body
       +-- router
       |  +-- flags?          bits
       |  +-- num-of-links?   uint16
       |  +-- link* [link-id link-data]
       |     +-- link-id?     union
       |     +-- link-data?   union
       |     +-- type?        uint8
       |     +-- topology* [mt-id]
       |        +-- mt-id?    uint8
       |        +-- metric?   uint16
       +-- network
       |  +-- network-mask?      inet:ipv4-address
       |  +-- attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
       +-- summary
       |  +-- network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
       |  +-- topology* [mt-id]
       |     +-- mt-id?    uint8
       |     +-- metric?   uint24
       +-- external
       |  +-- network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
       |  +-- topology* [mt-id]
       |     +-- mt-id?                uint8
       |     +-- flags?                bits
       |     +-- metric?               uint24
       |     +-- forwarding-address?   inet:ipv4-address
       |     +-- external-route-tag?   uint32
       +-- opaque
          +-- unknown-tlv* [type]
          |  +-- type?     uint16
          |  +-- length?   uint16
          |  +-- value?    yang:hex-string
          +-- router-address-tlv
          |  +-- router-address?   inet:ipv4-address
          +-- link-tlv
             +-- link-type                   uint8
             +-- link-id                     union
             +-- local-if-ipv4-addr*         inet:ipv4-address
             +-- local-remote-ipv4-addr*     inet:ipv4-address
             +-- te-metric?                  uint32
             +-- max-bandwidth?              decimal64
             +-- max-reservable-bandwidth?   decimal64
             +-- unreserved-bandwidth?       decimal64
             +-- admin-group?                uint32
             +-- unknown-subtlv* [type]
                +-- type?     uint16
                +-- length?   uint16
                +-- value?    yang:hex-string
  grouping ospfv3-lsa
    +-- header
    |  +-- lsa-id        uint32
    |  +-- age           uint16
    |  +-- type          uint16
    |  +-- adv-router    yang:dotted-quad
    |  +-- seq-num       string
    |  +-- checksum      string
    |  +-- length        uint16
    |  +-- options       bits
    +-- body
       +-- router
       |  +-- flags      bits
       |  +-- options    bits
       |  +-- link* [interface-id neighbor-interface-id neighbor-router-id]
       |     +-- interface-id?            uint32
       |     +-- neighbor-interface-id?   uint32
       |     +-- neighbor-router-id?      yang:dotted-quad
       |     +-- type?                    uint8
       |     +-- metric?                  uint16
       +-- network
       |  +-- options            bits
       |  +-- attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
       +-- inter-area-prefix
       |  +-- metric?           uint24
       |  +-- prefix?           string
       |  +-- prefix-options    string
       +-- inter-area-router
       |  +-- options                  bits
       |  +-- metric?                  uint24
       |  +-- destination-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
       +-- as-external
       |  +-- metric?                     uint24
       |  +-- flags?                      bits
       |  +-- referenced-ls-type?         uint16
       |  +-- prefix?                     string
       |  +-- prefix-options              string
       |  +-- forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
       |  +-- external-route-tag?         uint32
       |  +-- referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
       +-- nssa
       |  +-- metric?                     uint24
       |  +-- flags?                      bits
       |  +-- referenced-ls-type?         uint16
       |  +-- prefix?                     string
       |  +-- prefix-options              string
       |  +-- forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
       |  +-- external-route-tag?         uint32
       |  +-- referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
       +-- link
       |  +-- rtr-priority?                   uint8
       |  +-- options                         bits
       |  +-- link-local-interface-address?   inet:ip-address
       |  +-- num-of-prefixes?                uint32
       |  +-- prefix-list* [prefix]
       |     +-- prefix?           string
       |     +-- prefix-options    string
       +-- intra-area-prefix
          +-- referenced-ls-type?         uint16
          +-- referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
          +-- referenced-adv-router?      inet:ipv4-address
          +-- num-of-prefixes?            uint16
          +-- prefix-list* [prefix]
             +-- prefix?           string
             +-- prefix-options    string
             +-- metric?           uint24
  grouping lsa-common
    +-- decoded-completed?   boolean
    +-- raw-data?            yang:hex-string
  grouping lsa
    +-- decoded-completed?   boolean
    +-- raw-data?            yang:hex-string
    +-- (version)?
       +--:(v2)
       |  +-- ospfv2
       |     +-- header
       |     |  +-- options        bits
       |     |  +-- lsa-id         inet:ipv4-address
       |     |  +-- opaque-type    uint8
       |     |  +-- opaque-id      uint24
       |     |  +-- age            uint16
       |     |  +-- type           uint16
       |     |  +-- adv-router     yang:dotted-quad
       |     |  +-- seq-num        string
       |     |  +-- checksum       string
       |     |  +-- length         uint16
       |     +-- body
       |        +-- router
       |        |  +-- flags?          bits
       |        |  +-- num-of-links?   uint16
       |        |  +-- link* [link-id link-data]
       |        |     +-- link-id?     union
       |        |     +-- link-data?   union
       |        |     +-- type?        uint8
       |        |     +-- topology* [mt-id]
       |        |        +-- mt-id?    uint8
       |        |        +-- metric?   uint16
       |        +-- network
       |        |  +-- network-mask?      inet:ipv4-address
       |        |  +-- attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
       |        +-- summary
       |        |  +-- network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
       |        |  +-- topology* [mt-id]
       |        |     +-- mt-id?    uint8
       |        |     +-- metric?   uint24
       |        +-- external
       |        |  +-- network-mask?   inet:ipv4-address
       |        |  +-- topology* [mt-id]
       |        |     +-- mt-id?                uint8
       |        |     +-- flags?                bits
       |        |     +-- metric?               uint24
       |        |     +-- forwarding-address?   inet:ipv4-address
       |        |     +-- external-route-tag?   uint32
       |        +-- opaque
       |           +-- unknown-tlv* [type]
       |           |  +-- type?     uint16
       |           |  +-- length?   uint16
       |           |  +-- value?    yang:hex-string
       |           +-- router-address-tlv
       |           |  +-- router-address?   inet:ipv4-address
       |           +-- link-tlv
       |              +-- link-type                   uint8
       |              +-- link-id                     union
       |              +-- local-if-ipv4-addr*         inet:ipv4-address
       |              +-- local-remote-ipv4-addr*     inet:ipv4-address
       |              +-- te-metric?                  uint32
       |              +-- max-bandwidth?              decimal64
       |              +-- max-reservable-bandwidth?   decimal64
       |              +-- unreserved-bandwidth?       decimal64
       |              +-- admin-group?                uint32
       |              +-- unknown-subtlv* [type]
       |                 +-- type?     uint16
       |                 +-- length?   uint16
       |                 +-- value?    yang:hex-string
       +--:(v3)
          +-- ospfv3
             +-- header
             |  +-- lsa-id        uint32
             |  +-- age           uint16
             |  +-- type          uint16
             |  +-- adv-router    yang:dotted-quad
             |  +-- seq-num       string
             |  +-- checksum      string
             |  +-- length        uint16
             |  +-- options       bits
             +-- body
                +-- router
                |  +-- flags      bits
                |  +-- options    bits
                |  +-- link* [interface-id neighbor-interface-id neighbor-router-id]
                |     +-- interface-id?            uint32
                |     +-- neighbor-interface-id?   uint32
                |     +-- neighbor-router-id?      yang:dotted-quad
                |     +-- type?                    uint8
                |     +-- metric?                  uint16
                +-- network
                |  +-- options            bits
                |  +-- attached-router*   yang:dotted-quad
                +-- inter-area-prefix
                |  +-- metric?           uint24
                |  +-- prefix?           string
                |  +-- prefix-options    string
                +-- inter-area-router
                |  +-- options                  bits
                |  +-- metric?                  uint24
                |  +-- destination-router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
                +-- as-external
                |  +-- metric?                     uint24
                |  +-- flags?                      bits
                |  +-- referenced-ls-type?         uint16
                |  +-- prefix?                     string
                |  +-- prefix-options              string
                |  +-- forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
                |  +-- external-route-tag?         uint32
                |  +-- referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
                +-- nssa
                |  +-- metric?                     uint24
                |  +-- flags?                      bits
                |  +-- referenced-ls-type?         uint16
                |  +-- prefix?                     string
                |  +-- prefix-options              string
                |  +-- forwarding-address?         inet:ipv6-address
                |  +-- external-route-tag?         uint32
                |  +-- referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
                +-- link
                |  +-- rtr-priority?                   uint8
                |  +-- options                         bits
                |  +-- link-local-interface-address?   inet:ip-address
                |  +-- num-of-prefixes?                uint32
                |  +-- prefix-list* [prefix]
                |     +-- prefix?           string
                |     +-- prefix-options    string
                +-- intra-area-prefix
                   +-- referenced-ls-type?         uint16
                   +-- referenced-link-state-id?   uint32
                   +-- referenced-adv-router?      inet:ipv4-address
                   +-- num-of-prefixes?            uint16
                   +-- prefix-list* [prefix]
                      +-- prefix?           string
                      +-- prefix-options    string
                      +-- metric?           uint24
  grouping lsa-key
    +-- lsa-id?       union
    +-- adv-router?   inet:ipv4-address
  grouping af-area-config
    +-- range* [prefix]
       +-- prefix?      string
       +-- advertise?   boolean
       +-- cost?        uint24
  grouping area-config
    +-- area-type?      identityref
    +-- summary?        boolean
    +-- default-cost?   uint32
    +-- range* [prefix]
       +-- prefix?      string
       +-- advertise?   boolean
       +-- cost?        uint24
  grouping instance-config
    +-- router-id?          yang:dotted-quad {router-id}?
    +-- admin-distance
    |  +-- (granularity)?
    |  |  +--:(detail)
    |  |  |  +-- intra-area?   uint8
    |  |  |  +-- inter-area?   uint8
    |  |  +--:(coarse)
    |  |     +-- internal?     uint8
    |  +-- external?           uint8
    +-- nsr {nsr}?
    |  +-- enable?   boolean
    +-- graceful-restart {graceful-restart}?
    |  +-- enable?                       boolean
    |  +-- helper-enable?                boolean
    |  +-- restart-interval?             uint16
    |  +-- helper-strict-lsa-checking?   boolean
    +-- enable?             boolean {admin-control}?
    +-- auto-cost {auto-cost}?
    |  +-- enable?                boolean
    |  +-- reference-bandwidth?   uint32
    +-- spf-control
    |  +-- paths?   uint16 {max-ecmp}?
    +-- database-control
    |  +-- max-lsa?   uint32 {max-lsa}?
    +-- reload-control
    +-- mpls
    |  +-- te-rid {te-rid}?
    |  |  +-- (source)?
    |  |     +--:(interface)
    |  |     |  +-- interface?   if:interface-ref
    |  |     +--:(explicit)
    |  |        +-- router-id?   inet:ipv4-address
    |  +-- ldp
    |     +-- igp-sync?     boolean {ldp-igp-sync}?
    |     +-- autoconfig?   boolean {ldp-igp-autoconfig}?
    +-- fast-reroute {fast-reroute}?
       +-- lfa {lfa}?
  grouping interface-operation
    +-- network-type?          enumeration
    +-- passive?               boolean
    +-- demand-circuit?        boolean {demand-circuit}?
    +-- multi-area {multi-area-adj}?
    |  +-- multi-area-id?   area-id-type
    |  +-- cost?            uint16
    +-- static-neighbors
    |  +-- neighbor* [address]
    |     +-- address?         inet:ip-address
    |     +-- cost?            uint16
    |     +-- poll-interval?   uint16
    |     +-- priority?        uint8
    +-- node-flag?             boolean {node-flag}?
    +-- fast-reroute {fast-reroute}?
    |  +-- lfa {lfa}?
    |     +-- candidate-disabled?   boolean
    |     +-- enabled?              boolean
    |     +-- remote-lfa {remote-lfa}?
    |        +-- enabled?   boolean
    +-- cost?                  uint16
    +-- hello-interval?        uint16
    +-- dead-interval?         uint16
    +-- retransmit-interval?   uint16
    +-- transmit-delay?        uint16
    +-- mtu-ignore?            boolean {mtu-ignore}?
    +-- lls?                   boolean {lls}?
    +-- prefix-suppression?    boolean {prefix-suppression}?
    +-- bfd?                   boolean {bfd}?
    +-- ttl-security {ttl-security}?
    |  +-- enable?   boolean
    |  +-- hops?     uint8
    +-- enable?                boolean {admin-control}?
    +-- authentication
    |  +-- (auth-type-selection)?
    |     +--:(auth-ipsec) {ospfv3-authentication-ipsec}?
    |     |  +-- sa?                 string
    |     +--:(auth-trailer-key-chain)
    |     |  +-- key-chain?          key-chain:key-chain-ref
    |     +--:(auth-trailer-key)
    |        +-- key?                string
    |        +-- crypto-algorithm
    |           +-- (algorithm)?
    |              +--:(hmac-sha1-12)
    |              |  +-- hmac-sha1-12?   empty
    |              +--:(hmac-sha1-20)
    |              |  +-- hmac-sha1-20?   empty
    |              +--:(md5)
    |              |  +-- md5?            empty
    |              +--:(sha-1)
    |              |  +-- sha-1?          empty
    |              +--:(hmac-sha-1)
    |              |  +-- hmac-sha-1?     empty
    |              +--:(hmac-sha-256)
    |              |  +-- hmac-sha-256?   empty
    |              +--:(hmac-sha-384)
    |              |  +-- hmac-sha-384?   empty
    |              +--:(hmac-sha-512)
    |                 +-- hmac-sha-512?   empty
    +-- state?                 string
    +-- hello-timer?           uint32
    +-- wait-timer?            uint32
    +-- dr?                    inet:ipv4-address
    +-- bdr?                   inet:ipv4-address
  grouping neighbor-operation
    +-- address?   inet:ip-address
    +-- dr?        inet:ipv4-address
    +-- bdr?       inet:ipv4-address
    +-- state?     nbr-state-type
  grouping instance-operation
    +-- router-id?   yang:dotted-quad
  grouping route-content
    +-- tag?          uint32
    +-- route-type?   enumeration
  grouping notification-instance-hdr
    +-- routing-instance?        rt:routing-instance-ref
    +-- routing-protocol-name?   string
    +-- instance-af
       +-- af?   identityref
